# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

function wrap_string(text)
    # 将文本分割成单词列表
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = Vector{String}()

    for word in words
        if text_width > length(join(lines, "")) + length(word)
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            # 当前行的长度超过了限制，需要换行
            new_line = join(lines, "") * "\n"
            push!(lines, new_line)
            push!(lines, word)
        end
    end

    return join(lines, "")
end

# 示例
text = "Hello there this is a very long sentence that I want to wrap into multiple lines."
println(wrap_string(text))
# 输出应该类似于：
# Hello there this is a very long sentence
# that I want to wrap into multiple lines.
